author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 53 persons were admitted to various hospitals in the city for accident-related injuries after the New Year celebrations. Though the Beach promenade, one of the important tourist spots was out of bounds for vehicles from 2 p.m. on Thursday, rash and negligent driving by revellers on arterial roads in the city resulted in many accidents.

The two Government Hospitals in the city received around 40 persons while the Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (JIPMER) received around 13 persons. A number of vehicle users who were caught by the Traffic police for drunken driving were let off with a warning.
title: 53 New Year revellers injured
